description: The construction of a four to six storey building (Block H) on part of the former Hither Green Hospital site, Hither Green Lane SE13, comprising 310 square metres of retail (Use Class A1) floorspace and 1,029 square metres of leisure (Use Class D2) floorspace, 109 residential units (77 one bedroom, 31 two bedroom and 1 three bedroom units), together with the provision of cycle storage, 73 basement and 39 courtyard car parking spaces and 3 on street car parking bays.
site_name: Fomer Hither Green Hospital site (Block H) , 234-244
site_number: Fomer Hither Green Hospital site (Block H) , 234-244
